attributes.action: Hold a vote of no confidence in the UK Government - Failure to Protect Citizens
attributes.additional_details:
We believe the Government has failed to act effectively in the national interest and no longer commands public confidence.
MPs should act to restore trust and accountability through a formal vote of no confidence.
attributes.background:
We call on Members of Parliament to hold a vote of no confidence in His Majesty’s Government.
The Government has a duty to protect the well-being and security of its citizens. 

With multiple attacks, rapes and murders by migrants, we have lost confidence in them to protect us and our shores

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
